arts.ttl: Michael O’Neill salutes Northern Ireland’s five-star showing against Bulgaria
arts.sum: Isaac Price stole the show with a hat-trick, while an own goal from Bulgaria goalkeeper Dimitar Mitov and a late Josh Magennis finish sealed victory.

arts.ttl: Price scores hat-trick as five-star Northern Ireland thrash Bulgaria
arts.sum: Isaac Price's hat-trick powered Northern Ireland to a stunning 5-0 win over Bulgaria that sent them top of their Nations League group.

arts.ttl: Isaac Price scores hat-trick as five-star Northern Ireland thrash Bulgaria
arts.sum: Price became the first Northern Ireland player to hit a treble since David Healy in a 4-1 win over Liechtenstein in March 2007

arts.ttl: Isaac Price scores hat-trick as five-star Northern Ireland thrash Bulgaria
arts.sum: Price became the first Northern Ireland player to hit a treble since David Healy in a 4-1 win over Liechtenstein in March 2007.

arts.ttl: How to watch Northern Ireland vs Bulgaria FOR FREE: TV channel and live stream for Nations League today
arts.sum: Michael O’Neill’s still in the hunt for promotion to League B

arts.ttl: The key talking points ahead of Northern Ireland’s clash with Bulgaria
arts.sum: Northern Ireland’s lack of goals was on stark display again in Saturday’s 0-0 draw against Belarus.

arts.ttl: Conor Bradley hoping to push Liverpool claims with Northern Ireland performances
arts.sum: The 21-year-old defender will captain his country again in Tuesday’s match against Bulgaria.

arts.ttl: Conor Bradley reveals Liverpool star inspiring him as Northern Ireland captain
arts.sum: Conor Bradley will skipper Northern Ireland against Bulgaria on Tuesday and says he is taking inspiration from Liverpool star Virgil van Dijk, who is his captain at the Premier League giants
